segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of frustration looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are clearly engaged in a secret operation to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are breaking a social rule, taking things without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little angry that the woman is so completely unaware of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's right there, just a few feet away, but her focus is entirely elsewhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels irresponsible, her missing so many obvious things around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is in a dangerous position, and she should be supervising him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of unsupervised mischief can lead to real problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself wanting to call out to her, to alert her to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of the mess and potential falls makes me quite agitated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just the cookies, it's the whole situation spiraling out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
